live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. A further update will be provided at 09:26 CT. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
63713.summary: Some customers in the Waverley Heights area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
63713.title: July 8 - Winnipeg (Waverley Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Work to restore services in the area continues. Thank you for your patience.
